          <title>
            <string language="en">Conversion of potential energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvertierung der möglichen Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conversion d'énergie potentielle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conversão da energia potencial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conversione di energia potenziale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετατροπή της πιθανής ενέργειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conversión de la energía potencial</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how the potential energy of a falling book is converted into kinetic, thermal, and sound energy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy conversion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">falling book</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie die mögliche Energie 
eines fallenden Buches in kinetische, thermische und stichhaltige 
Energie umgewandelt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment l'énergie 
potentielle d'un livre en chute est convertie en énergie cinétique, 
thermique, et saine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como a energia potencial de 
um livro de queda é convertida na energia cinética, térmica, e 
sadia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come l'energia potenziale di
un libro cadente è convertita in energia cinetica, termica e sana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς η πιθανή ενέργεια 
ενός μειωμένου βιβλίου μετατρέπεται στην κινητική, θερμική, και 
υγιή ενέργεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo la energía potencial
de un libro que cae se convierte en energía cinética, termal, y 
sana.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiekonvertierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fallendes Buch</string>
          </keyword>
